article_text:
Caption

President Obama in Alaska

Andrew Harnik / Associated Press

President Barack Obama looks at Bear Glacier, which has receded 1.8 miles in approximately 100 years, while on a boat tour to see the effects of global warming in Resurrection Cove, Alaska.

article_metadata.Description: For a state used to the briefest of presidential stopovers, President Obama's extended visit to Alaska this week has been an opportunity to savor.
article_metadata.author: Los Angeles Times
